ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Box, & FREE 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
16 Cameras: 8*Bullet Cameras, 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera, 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 66 IR LEDs, 196 ft IR Distance WDR(Wide Dynamic Range) OSD Menu, Vandal proof & water proof ;; 8*Dome Cameras, Professional 1/3" Effio CCD Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98 ft IR Distance, Vandalproof, WDR(Wide Dynamic Range), OSD Menu.
16 Channel DVR with 4TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs, Support CDRW/DVD-RW, 2 USB ports for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Enterprice CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 16 Channel DVR 4TB HDD 960H & D1 Real-Time 30fps Recording Support CDRW/DVD-RW, 16 Effio Cameras(8*Bullet & 8*Dome) 700 TV Lines 2.8~12mm Vari-Focal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
